It's really fun. I love the mods and specifically shout out to Jujutsu Playgrounds. Also it's fun to torture people! :steamhappy: I have over 300 hours put into this game at the time of reviewing this game and I probably have lots more to come. The gameplay never really gets boring, especially with the vast variety of mods. And all this fun and replayability for £7, and I'm pretty sure I bought it on sale too. There's infinite possibilities and I would no hesitation buy it again. I recommend highly, W game and W devs. Although it's a 9.9/10 because there hasn't been an update in like almost a year

This game is a very good physics and sandbox 2D pixelated simulator. The freedom, modding capability, and array of varying tools and abilities make it notably different than most other such physics sandboxes I've seen, or at least 2D sandboxes. However, I would highly recommend that this game be only played by a 14+ year-old audience at youngest, as the games "Human" tool can get fairly graphic/violent rather quickly, depending on their situation you set them in. As some of the pictures/GIFs/videos on this product suggest, there are many creative methods for killing the 'Humans' you place in the sandbox. This game is certainly PG-13 in my opinion, and parents should be wary of the game's more morbid side.

In other news, the game is, again, very good as a physics sandbox and simulator. Controls are good, and fairly easy to master after some effort. Would recommend, but with caution.

The game is a fun sandbox, sure. But after maybe a day or two of messing around or building complex designs you start to notice the limitations, bugs, and how lacking the base content is...
And while yes, mods do exist, (and they can somewhat decently increase your playtime.) they still can't fully solve this issue.
I wont mention things like the community being toxic or issues experienced by other players since I myself don't interact with said community.
My main gripe with it has always been, and still is, the lack of updates. It is mainly because of that, that I can't recommend this game unless things change and the developer starts updating it again.

This game in theory is fun, but the controls are so God awful it's impossible to play. Nothing makes sense. The controls aren't anything like any other game I've ever played.
